      • create

        public static BamSDK create(android.app.Activity rootActivity,
                            java.lang.String apiToken,
                            java.lang.String apiSecret,
                            JumioDataCenter dataCenter)
                     throws PlatformNotSupportedException
        Creates an BamSDK instance
        Parameters:
        rootActivity - activity which starts the BamSDK
        apiToken - The API token of your Jumio merchant account
        apiSecret - The corresponding API secret
        dataCenter - Select the JumioDataCenter (US, EU)
        Returns:
        An initialized BamSDK instance
        Throws:
        PlatformNotSupportedException - if the current platform is not supported by the sdk

      • addCustomField

        public void addCustomField(java.lang.String fieldId,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> values,
                           boolean required,
                           java.lang.String resetValueText)
        Custom fields the user is asked to fill in to finish a scan. Retrievable via the fieldID in BamCardInformation.
        Parameters:
        fieldId - Unique ID of your field
        title - Label text describing the field
        values - A list of predefined values, the user will be able to select from
        required - Indicates if a selection is required for positive validation
        resetValueText - The text that will be shown as first item in spinner component to enable

      • setSoundEffect

        public void setSoundEffect(int soundResourceId)

        Set the resource Id of a sound file to give a short audio feedback to the user when the card is detected.

        Parameters:

      • start

        public void start()
           throws MissingPermissionException
        Starts the scan.

        By calling this function, the ScanCardActivity will be started.

        Specified by:
        start in class com.jumio.MobileSDK
        Throws:
        MissingPermissionException - if any of the required permissions is not granted
